attributes.additional_details:
John Wilkinson aka "Pigeon Man" has been jailed for 6 weeks for feeding the pigeons of morecambe, if you feel as strongly as I do about how wrong and unjust this is; that a pensioner has yet again been failed by the state and you think John should be released then sign this petition and ask others to do the same!

John clearly needs health care and a doctor, not a prison sentence and a cell mate.
